item.title: Rock climbing technique
item.description: Overall technique video collections Will list these channels/playlists in the order I have discovered them, the Neil Gresham one is a must watch! :) All of them are really good quality content with interesting discussions in the comments. Most of the channels apart from Crux Films have other great content as well Crux Films - Neil Gresham Climbing Masterclass https://www.youtube.com/@Cruxfilmsclimbing Mani the Monkey - Rock Climbing Technique playlist https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLtfngg_GZtb93FAaysIMnmpfd3u6QlYDE Movement for Climbers - Climbing Technique https://www.

item.title: Tdd Notes
item.description: Test Driven Development notes Continuous delivery videos: Test Driven Development vs Behavior Driven Development https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Bq_oz7nCNUA When Test Driven Development Goes Wrong https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UWtEVKVPBQ0 Continuous delivery free course: https://courses.cd.training/courses/tdd-tutorial Kent Beck TDD course first 10 minutes: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VVSSga1Olt8 Good write ups about above video, not sure how to locate all videos… Kent commented that they are not available. https://pierodibello.medium.com/my-notes-on-kent-becks-tdd-course-8a1a7c8b7a95 https://www.markhneedham.com/blog/2010/07/28/kent-becks-test-driven-development-screencasts/ https://www.tddfellow.com/blog/categories/tdd-screencasts/ https://www.dapengli.com/2015/01/03/kent-beck-tdd/ Ruby implementation: https://github.com/destiny-index/tyrant-tdd TDD Book by Kent Beck: https://learning.oreilly.com/library/view/test-driven-development/0321146530/ DevTernity video:
